code: @Override public Boolean call() throws Exception {     boolean success = false.     try {         BufferConsumerAndChannel consumerAndChannel.         while ((consumerAndChannel = source.getNextBufferConsumer()) != null) {             partition.addBufferConsumer(consumerAndChannel.getBufferConsumer(), consumerAndChannel.getTargetChannel()).             // Check for interrupted flag after adding data to prevent resource leaks             if (Thread.interrupted()) {                 throw new InterruptedException().             }             if (isSlowProducer) {                 Thread.sleep(random.nextInt(MAX_SLEEP_TIME_MS + 1)).             }         }         partition.finish().         success = true.         return true.     } finally {         if (!success) {             partition.release().         }     } }
